title: Carbon Black Cloud - Overview
description: This provides a high level summary of alerts, endpoint events, authentication events and watchlist hits.

definition.content:
[Carbon Black Cloud](https://www.broadcom.com/products/carbon-black/threat-prevention/carbon-black-cloud) is a cloud-native endpoint protection platform that provides centralized visibility and control over endpoint activity. It enables threat detection, investigation, and response through continuous monitoring and behavioral analytics, helping security teams improve defenses and respond faster.

This dashboard provides a high level summary of alerts, endpoint events, authentication events watchlist hits and audit logs.

For more information, see the [Carbon Black Cloud Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/carbon_black_cloud/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **carbon black cloud** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
